fields.summary: iOS: Kitchensink - Base UI>Views>Events Propagation does not report label clicks

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
NOT a regression, occurs in 3.1.3.GA as well

Description:
Base UI>Views>Events Propagation normally reports clicks on the window, the views, and the labels within the views. Clicks on the labels are reported as undefined.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Package KS for mobile web and open on iOS, Android or BB devices
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Events Propagation
3) Click on any of the labels ("A", "B", "C", or "D")

Result:
The label clicks are reported as undefined at the bottom of the screen
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Kitchensink - Base UI > Views > Events Propagation does not report label clicks
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311211626
Titanium SDK, build 3.2.0.v20131122102444
KS 3.2.0.GA
Xcode 5.0.2
iPhone 5S - Safari7
BBZ10  browser

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
